categories: Category:Battles of the Yuuzhan Vong War

nodes.text: Between 25 ABY and 29 ABY during the invasion of the galaxy by the extra-galactic Yuuzhan Vong species, which became known as the Yuuzhan Vong War, the Vong attacked the Hollastin system within Hutt Space. The attack took place between the years 26 ABY and 27 ABY and the Vong reached the system by traveling down the Hollastin Run hyperlane from a previous battle in the Circumtore system. After the attack the Vong continued down the same hyperlane and attacked the Tsyk system.

The attack on the Hollastin system was first shown in The Essential Atlas, a reference book released in 2009 and written by Jason Fry and Daniel Wallace. The attack is not mentioned in the text of the book but it shown on a map detailing conflicts in the galaxy between 26 ABY and 27 ABY during the Yuuzhan Vong war, which was called "collapse of the Core". No information is given about the outcome of the attack although a separate map shows Hollastin was under Vong control by 27 ABY.
